Name: VICCP
About the game: Brainstorming / Puzzle / Quest / Point Click. You are using mysterious remote control that you can control. Click on everything and explore. Make decisions, solve puzzles. Every choice you make will have consequences. The game has a lot of endings that you have to find yourself. FEATURES Lots of puzzles Atmospheric graphics and soundtrack Achievements/bonuses for each ending you find Old school spirit A lot of endings. Many references and Easter eggs.
